original_text: And now shall mine head be lifted up above mine enemies round about me: therefore will I offer in his tabernacle sacrifices of joy; I will sing, yea, I will sing praises unto the Lord.
korean_text: 이제 내 머리가 나를 둘러싼 내 원수 위에 들리리니 내가 그의 장막에서 즐거운 제사를 드리겠고 노래하며 여호와를 찬송하리로다

sentences.original_text: And now shall mine head be lifted up
above mine enemies round about me
therefore will I offer in his tabernacle
yea, I will sing praises unto the Lord
